title: Identify the input values
text: When considering area as a function of raidus, radius is the input values.

title: Identify the output values
text: When considering area as a function of raidus, area is the output values.

title: Write the formula
text: The area formula of a circle is $$A=\pi r^2$$.

title: Classify the relation
text: According to the formula $$A=\pi r^2$$, each r can lead to only one particular A, so the area of a circle is a function of its radius.
